text: Walter Hurschler (born 25 April 1959) is a Swiss skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1984 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Switzerland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:People from Obwalden
title: Walter Hurschler
